website_summaries.verdict: A large, bag-style log carrier sturdy enough to weather through many winters.
pros: 5" handles can be carried over the shoulder
waxed canvas with stitched PU handles
Front and back of bag is higher than sides
Bag-style keeps debris from falling from your wood load
Material is scratch-resistant, stain, and wear resistant
Can be used as an oversized tote for large items
cons: Company says handles are leather, but also states they are PU leather
Flexible material does not stand up to allow easy filling with wood

customer_reviews.title: Works well, expect wear and tear.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for hauling firewood in, but after several months of use, we've found that the bottom has a couple very small holes. I know it's from the sharp bits off of the cedar juniper we use, but everything wears. I decided it's also because we haul as much as we can lift, which weighs more, speeding up the wear. We're only loading it to the top of the side walls now. Hoping less weight means it'll last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This tote works great, just like it’s supposed to. All of the excess debris stays in the tote and can be emptied as needed. I tend to pack it full and it holds a ton. (Sometimes too heavy to carry) The construction is just as advertised strong and durable. This will last years!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Collins

customer_reviews.title: Why did I live without this before?!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! We use our wood burning fireplace a great deal of evenings during the Winter months. I simply got tired of the bark/twigs/etc being left on the hearth AND the annoyance of making multiple trips from the wood stack to inside the home. This product is fantastic! I can fill an entire night's use of wood in ONE TRIP and no more bark/leaves/etc left on the hearth for clean up. To add... I recently needed something to use to pick up sticks and twigs after an ice storm and used this as a convenience. Worked great for that too! I highly recommend it and I am very pleased with the quality. Great job, INNO STAGE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Using this for the firewood as intended, but I can see how this could be useful for many things. Very sturdy thick canvas & great quality leather handles. My firewood this year is much bigger logs than other years and I can only put 3 or for logs in the bag before its too heavy to carry. Still plenty of room in the bag though for more wood. This wood be great for camping, beach trips or other ways in which you need a big bag to carry a bunch of random stuff. Very pleased. Amazon can have some poor quality stuff at times, but this is NOT one of those items.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: A good beginner bag
customer_reviews.text: Would be very nice if the bag was 2 to 4 inches longer. Most of our wood is cut 18 to 20 inches depending on the wood stove. 2nd thing is the corners should be sewn so you could insert like a 1x2 to hold the bag vertical. I am going to do more research or more than likely will make our own. We have a leather machine.
customer_reviews.author: Philip S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love this canvas bag. I live in an old cabin, and I need to have firewood, inside for my woodstove. I can fit a nice amount of wood in this bag, and it looks nice inside. The bag is well made, sturdy, and of quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. True

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good quality material
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry firewood from downstairs to the wood stove. I'm the female in the house and I was looking for something that I could put over my shoulder and it wouldn't be too heavy. I am able to put 6-8 logs in here and carry without killing myself.
customer_reviews.author: Karla D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & very durable
customer_reviews.text: We have to lug wood from the basement to upstairs. You can fir a decent amount in it and its fairly comfortable to carry. The bag itself is lightweight but extremely durable- we also get a lot of compliments on it when it's near our fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: TReny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy holds enough easy to pack in the car
customer_reviews.text: Can comfortably hold about 14 or so logs. handles are sturdy and do not seem to be tripping after multiple uses. I like it that this log carrier is covered on the ends, prevents the risk of dropping a log on your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: This bag is made well. Good stitching, heavy waxed canvas, and sturdy handles. It holds a good amount of wood. Definitely worth the money, especially when compared to other name brands from Maine...
customer_reviews.author: Nino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it! Perfect size and color! Looks exactly as it’s shown.
customer_reviews.author: Melony DeVos

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. I use it for outdoor camping gear. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly wisperer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I chose this bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, the rectangle bottom and the closed ends were a great idea, nice looking also! Perfect for bringing firewood into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jonassink

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: we have two of these, one to carry wood. the other we use in our garden to carry picked fruit/veggies.. It's durable and great!
customer_reviews.author: poookiii

customer_reviews.title: Awesome duel purpose bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Works great for wood, but we also use it for transferring larger items that just don’t fit in a bag. We will need to but another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We get wood everyday throughout the new England fall/winter. And this is standing up to the challenge. It hasn't frayed or gotten a weak spot at all
customer_reviews.author: mcampion

customer_reviews.title: We love this bag
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, the bags look great, and they hold a LOT of wood. The handles started cracking after many consecutive months of daily use, but that doesn't bother me and doesn't affect the integrity of the bag. We have two of these now and I am about to purchase another to use to carry ammo and guns to the range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Use in my RV for misc items along with retrieving firewood, great bag at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for a small wood fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: it is made well, roomy for kindling and smaller wood pieces, looks good, easy to carry, keeps my fireplace area clean and neat. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy. Keeps all the wood debris in the bag not on the floor, wife loves that.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Must have for wood!
customer_reviews.text: Love my wood bag! Extremely study and can handle big loads of wood!
customer_reviews.author: Winifred J Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and durable
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot So far it is durable Looks good next to the fireplace
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harper

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good size
customer_reviews.text: It's a very similar material to Carhartt pants. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Marchetti

customer_reviews.title: not self standing
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this log carrier except it doesn't stand on it's own as advertised. Good quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim b.

customer_reviews.title: GreT Product
customer_reviews.text: Carrying fire wood in the house great product would buy again works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: William Ham

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Makes life so much easier bringing wood inside for a fire!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine DeMatteis

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little larger than what I had pictured in my mind, but that's a good thing. I have my standard bug-out bag but I still had leftover items I needed to take that would have weighed down my bag too much so I got this. I tossed my sleeping bag, shovel, axe, cookware and a half dozen other items into this and it's perfect. Comfortable handle too. And, now when I camp, I also have a log carrier! Worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks “distressed” and it’s very stiff
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t bad, seems sturdy, but comes with either the dye or wax coating uneven. Looks used, dusty, dirty, and there is nothing you can do to clean it or improve the look of it. Obviously the inside is going to get dirty, logs and all, but I didn’t like the outside looking very used when it’s new. Not something you’d place on a nice hearth. If you’re into rustic and distressed, it’s fine. Although it’s not very foldable or bendable when not in use. Kind of a big dusty looking lump. Also won’t stand up on its own. Buy it for the utility of carrying logs, only. Not for looks or convenience.
customer_reviews.author: sfrnofls

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my fiance. He recently moved to AL from AZ. He is anxious to use my fireplace. He ordered a 1/2 a cord of wood and 2 wood racks. I ordered the tote as a surprise. He really likes it. Seems well made, like it has sides so the bark does not fall out all over my house. Can't say how well it will hold up, haven't used to tote logs yet. Like that it is waxed.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Very Tough
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is a fantastic, with great attention to detail. I'm using it to carry tools around and it handles the 40+ lbs that fit in it with ease. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: K Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Works as a tool bag also.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously this bag would do a great job of carrying logs but I use it for a slightly different purpose. I use it as a large tool, tool bag. It's perfect for carrying things like clamps, jigsaw, and other larger tools that won't fit in a typical tool bag.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Construction sides to contain debris
customer_reviews.text: Only started using a week ago. But seems sturdy and leather handles are great. I bought because it has full sides to keep it from dropping debris when we bring it inside. Very useful. Very good value compared to other options out there.
customer_reviews.author: QueenBee

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad for Christmas. He has a wood stove and uses it multiple times a day during the winter. He says it is the best wood carrier he has ever had. It's the perfect large wood carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Pigg414

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose tote
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it for firewood yet, but works great as an all purpose tote. It’s very nice quality and I have no doubt it’ll hold up well. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, I had a canvas type bag that I got from the local hardware store for year before getting this one, night and day difference! This one actually looks nice sitting on the hearth.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wood carrier - sturdy, attractive material and roomy enough to carry a lot of wood!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: For the man who  has everything  !!
customer_reviews.text: great tote for larger materials ... Too nice to be carrying wood from the wood pile to the heated shop !!! I might keep for myself : )
customer_reviews.author: MARIE P.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: very tough, does the job and saves your arms. also keeps your house cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Brimarteen

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag holds plenty of wood and it's deep enough that all the little dust does not fall out of the bag. The handles are sturdy and I have personally put over 50 Lbs in the bag with NO issue at all. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: K-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bag made with thick canvas. I like the green color. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tomboyzilla

customer_reviews.title: Keeps debris in bag and holds a fair amount of wood.
customer_reviews.text: It is just as described, heavy canvas and sturdy handles. I use it to transfer wood from outside to the stove inside. With the sides it doesn’t drop debris on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This wood carrier holds a ton of wood - easy to carry up and down the stairs to the 2nd floor fireplace. Great Quality!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Carry
customer_reviews.text: It's held up well, and is easy to fill and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh C.

product_meta.title: INNO STAGE Heavy Duty Firewood Log Carrier Tote Bag, Large Wood Storage Hay Hauling for Fireplace Fire Pit Outdoor Camping
feature_bullets: Oversized dimension - 23.4" L X 10" D X 11.4" H , with 5" handles, easy to ①carry across shoulder②carry by the hand ③carry by two persons.
Largest log holder - 2.4 cu ft (0.07 m³) bulk. Leather tote bag design to carry smaller pieces. Upper no-end walls open design works great to carry a fair amount of bigger wood.
Heavy duty material - 16oz Waxed canvas material , scratch-resistant, stain and wear resistant; Reinforced handles was made from nice PU, more durable & load-bearing, long lasting.

Multi-function - As a fire wood carrier,to keep wood chips inside and not scattered on floor, for firepite, grilling and pretty much everything about outdoors; As normal storage tote bag, to gathering Christmas tree, festival items, garden tools, picnic or camping accessories, packing kid toys & storage quilt and other household supplies. Can be fold up, easy to storage when not in use.
Gifts for relatives and friends- Help her or him lighten the burden of carrying

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
